titles: Two letters from Vice-Admiral John Lavvson, the one to the Right Honourable, the Lord Mayor of the City of London; to be communicated to the court of aldermen, and Common-Council of the said City. The other, to the Honorable the commissioners for the militia of the City of London. Dated December the 28. 1659.
author: Lawson, John, Sir, d. 1665.
notes: Expressing his confidence in them and the willingness of the Navy to assist them.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
